column1: Charallave is a city in the state of Miranda
column3: and part of Miranda's Valles del Tuy region. It is the capital of Cristóbal Rojas Municipality. The name derives from the local Charavares indigenous people found at the time the city was founded.

column1: The city is connected to Caracas' public transport system via two train stations
column2: Charallave Norte (Generalísimo Francisco de Miranda) and Charallave Sur (Don Simon Rodríguez).
